tool_description: Schedules and coordinates sample transportation between collection sites, laboratories, and external facilities while maintaining proper conditions.

sample_barcodes.description: List of samples to be transported

error_messages: Invalid samples: One or more sample_barcodes are not found or not ready for transport.
Invalid locations: origin_location or destination_location is not recognized.
Invalid transport priority: Use routine, urgent, or stat.
No transport capacity: No available transport services for the requested time and conditions.
Temperature conflict: Samples have incompatible temperature requirements for joint transport.
Invalid pickup time: preferred_pickup_time must be in future and in ISO 8601 format.
Courier unavailable: Specified courier_preference is not available for this route.
usage: Schedule sample transport by providing sample_barcodes, origin_location, and destination_location. Optionally specify transport_priority, temperature_requirements, preferred_pickup_time, and courier_preference.

transport_id.description: Unique identifier for the transport request
